snippet.title: Silent Depths - Short gameplay video
snippet.description:
Silent Depths is a turn based tactical RPG set in a post-apocalyptic underwater setting. Explore a procedurally generated Ocean, command your submarine and fight beasts, pirates and creatures beyond your crew's comprehension.

👉 Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2820850/Silent_Depths/
